author: zakkbeard
post_text: April 28, 2022 at 6:08 AM#1Hey all, I saw it done a while back and I can't remember for the life of me the syntax for it.On a festival soon where my console is acting as a master and a pass-through for artnet merge, etc. I have NPU's and nodes at my data rack, and I'd like to be able to assign them to a session (Headline act in session 2, Direct Support in session 3, etc.) so I don't have to have each operator manually uninvite the hardware, then manually invite it back to my session for other acts. Any help?

title: Assign NPU to session?
